mpmToolbox.projectData.audio

Class WaveformImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • java.awt.image.BufferedImage
        • mpmToolbox.projectData.audio.WaveformImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.RenderedImage, java.awt.image.WritableRenderedImage, java.awt.Transparency

    public class WaveformImage
extends java.awt.image.BufferedImage
    This class is basically a BufferedImage with some additional information about the display metrics.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
